ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 56
ygData.msgSnippet: There s a forge in Oggok and the components for smithing come from the miner in Grobb in the front of Nightkeep.  I don t know about brewing, tho. ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
There's a forge in Oggok and the components for smithing come from the miner
in Grobb in the front of Nightkeep. I don't know about brewing, tho.

-----Original Message-----
From: phrederick
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Sent: 7/3/99 3:09 AM
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] Digest Number 56

From: phrederick <fire3@...>

i am a troll shadowknight on povar. still only 5th level,
but i am having a lot of fun getting plastered with ogre
swill. ;) do any of the troll/ogre sk's know where i can
practice brewing or smithing? i want to learn these two
trade skills at some point.
gugbug, 5th level troll shadowknight
povar
